articles.title: #1 Vols Explode in Record-Setting Win at Mississippi State - University of Tennessee Athletics
articles.description: STARKVILLE, Miss. – The top-ranked Tennessee Volunteers homered three times in the first inning and never took their foot off the gas in a 27-2 annihilation of Mississippi State in Thursday night's series opener at Dudy Noble Field.
